entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers overnight with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or thunderstorms. High 22 except 13 near Lake Erie.
entry.summary: Showers or thunderstorms. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 22 except 13 near Lake Erie. Humidex 26. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
